original_title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode One - Shadows
overview: Followed by a man she claims she does not know, a woman tells her tale to the police, but she is hiding the truth and when it catches up to her, past deeds will come back to take their bloody revenge.
tagline: There is life in the shadows.  Terror in the night.  Death in the dark.
title: The Stalker Chronicles: Episode One - Shadows
